def_en: A trailer is a container on wheels which is pulled by a car or other vehicle and which is used for transporting large or heavy items.

def_cn: (卡车或货车的)载货挂车
def_en: A trailer is the long rear section of a lorry or truck, in which the goods are carried.

def_cn: 拖车式活动房屋(或工作室)
def_en: A trailer is a long vehicle without an engine which people use as a home or as an office and which can be pulled behind a car.

def_cn: (电影或电视节目的)预告片
def_en: A trailer for a film or television programme is a set of short extracts which are shown to advertise it.
